column3: Latest;Banteay Meanchey:------ According to National Police in Poipet
column4: 15 Chinese men and  women  were arrested for an illegal online gambling operation in a rented villa in Kbal Spean II Village
column5: Poipet. The incident took place on the evening of 15 January 2019.------ The 15 Chinese people held a visa for working
column6: but no work permit. The equipment used for the online casino was seized in the raid.------The 15 Chinese nationals have been sent to the Banteay Meanchey provincial police commission for questioning and legal action. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/405394
